footer.contato: Need more help? Contact our support.

empresa.descricao: This module is the command center of your business. Here you define the company identity, manage team access and control essential features.
empresa.descricao_curta: Creation, activation, catalog and user management.

criacao.conteudo: The first step is to register your company. The creator becomes Owner with full access.
criacao.dominio_descricao: This field defines the unique link for your public catalog (ex: .../catalog/your-company).

ativacao.conteudo: To unlock all features, your company needs to be activated in the Activation screen.
ativacao.necessario_descricao: A valid key must be inserted to unlock full access. Without it, usage is limited.

catalogo.conteudo: In the "Company" screen, edit your business information and manage your public catalog.
catalogo.vitrine_descricao: The catalog is a public page for customers. You can activate or deactivate it at any time.
catalogo.link_descricao: The catalog link uses the chosen domain and is visible on this screen for sharing.

usuarios.conteudo: In the "Users" screen, invite team members and manage what each one can do.
usuarios.permissoes_descricao: Define specific permissions for each user, such as "create products", for finer control.

produtos.descricao: The Product Management module is the heart of the inventory system. Here you register and manage all your business products.
produtos.descricao_curta: Complete guide on how to register and manage your products.

cadastro.titulo: How to Register a New Product
cadastro.conteudo: Access the products screen, click New Product and fill out the form with required and optional data.
cadastro.descricao2: Locate the button in the upper right corner.
cadastro.imagem_alt: Button to create a new product

quantidade_minima.conteudo: Set a minimum quantity to receive automatic alerts when stock reaches attention or critical levels.
quantidade_minima.label: Minimum Quantity

notificacoes.descricao: The system will send alerts when stock reaches critical levels.

movimentacoes.conteudo: After creating a product, access it and click Stock to perform movements.
movimentacoes.descricao: After creating a product, access it and click "Stock" to register entries or exits, informing quantity and reason.
movimentacoes.descricao1: In the list, click on the desired product.

historico.descricao: There are two ways to access a product's history. Both lead to the same details screen.
historico.passo2_inventario: Select the product in the list.

vendas.descricao: The Sales screen is the central point for recording product exits and interacting with your customer base.
vendas.descricao_curta: Guide on how to record sales and manage customers.

realizando_venda.conteudo: Add products to cart, select customer and finish. The system automatically updates stock.
realizando_venda.descricao: Add products to cart, select customer and finish. The system automatically updates stock.
realizando_venda.ponto1: Only products with stock are listed for sale.
realizando_venda.ponto2: The sale creates an exit movement in stock.
realizando_venda.ponto3: The record stays in the product history with the reason "Sale".

clientes.conteudo: Associate sales with customers for accurate control. Register them first in the Customers screen.
clientes.descricao: Associate sales with customers for accurate control. Register them first in the Customers screen.
clientes.cadastro_descricao: In "Customers", click "New Customer" and fill in the information.
clientes.associacao_descricao: In the Sales screen, use the selection field to choose a customer before finishing the purchase.

pedidos.descricao: The Stock Orders module formalizes product replenishment with your Suppliers.
pedidos.descricao_curta: Learn how to make replenishment orders to your suppliers.

criacao.titulo: How to Create a New Order
criacao.conteudo: To create an order, you need to have products and suppliers already registered. The order is always linked to a supplier.
criacao.descricao: To create an order, you need to have products and suppliers already registered. The order is always linked to a supplier.
criacao.descricao1: Choose the supplier to filter associated products.
criacao.descricao3: When created, the order is automatically sent by email.

status.conteudo: Track the order through its status to maintain control.
status.descricao: Track the order through its status to maintain control.
status.ponto1: Possible status: Pending, Processing, Completed, Cancelled.
status.ponto2: When completing an order, the system automatically makes stock entry.
status.ponto3: You can track each order's history in the Orders screen.
